summary: An American boy and a French girl run away from a Swiss school making for Paris to reunite with their parents. The boy's father and the girl's mother join forces, despite cultural differences, to search for their kids.
cast: Gene Kelly|Barbara Laage|Michael Redgrave|Bobby Clark|Brigitte Fossey|Roger Tréville|Colette Deréal|Jess Hahn|Maryse Martin|Roger Saget|Van Doude|Claire Gérard|Colin Mann|Alexandre Rignault|T. Bartlett|Charles Bouillaud|Christian Brocard|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Georges Demas|Lucien Desagneaux|Patrick Dewaere|Jacques Dufilho|Paul Faivre|Claude Ferna|Émile Genevois|Corrado Guarducci|René Hell|Keith Jackson|Harry Locke|Dominique Maurin|Yves-Marie Maurin|Paul Mercey|Jacques Moulières|Léon Pauléon|Jimmy Perrys|Paul Préboist|Marcel Pérès|Jimmy Urbain
title: El camino feliz
